parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of colors excluded from the mask image

title: IDecal.IGetMaskExcludedColors
description: Gets the colors excluded from the mask image for this decal.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of colors excluded from the mask image

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the RGB colors excluded from the mask image VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IDecal::GetMaskExcludedColorsCount
to get the value of Count.
